com.allisonrodenbaugh.springboothelloworld

Class Controller

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.allisonrodenbaugh.springboothelloworld.Controller
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    AdminActions, CustomerActions

    @SpringBootApplication
public class Controller
extends java.lang.Object

    Main Controller Class

    The Controller class displays the roles for the user to select and contains functions for gathering user input.

    Note: This class acts as the main controller class. The application uses the Spring framework.

    Since:
    Fall 2018
